plugins.name: sd-harvest
plugins.description: Harvest time tracking integration — log daily work, assemble weekly timesheets from git history, submit to Harvest.

plugins.name: sd-team
plugins.description: Team availability and suggestion — view developer utilization from Harvest, manage roster via Google Sheets, suggest team configurations for projects.

plugins.name: sd-estimates
plugins.description: Project estimate generator — produce tiered cost proposals using SD bill rates and team configurations.

plugins.name: sd-sales
plugins.description: RFP and sales proposal support — SD capabilities, case studies, service catalog, and proposal templates.

plugins.name: sd-knowledge
plugins.description: Internal knowledge base — architecture decisions, technical standards, project retrospectives, and coding conventions.

plugins.name: sd-hr
plugins.description: HR and benefits Q&A — PTO policy, health insurance, retirement plan, expense policy, and onboarding information.

plugins.name: sd-recruit
plugins.description: Recruiting assistant — decode job descriptions to extract actual requirements, generate screening rubrics for candidates.

plugins.name: sd-reports
plugins.description: Weekly status report generator — produce client-ready project reports from Harvest time entries, git history, and Google Calendar meetings.

plugins.name: sd-sow
plugins.description: Statement of Work generator — produce draft SOWs from approved estimates with milestones, deliverables, and payment schedules.

plugins.name: sd-risk
plugins.description: Project risk profiling — heuristic assessment of budget overrun likelihood with mitigation strategies.

plugins.name: sd-actuals
plugins.description: Budget tracking — compare estimated vs actual hours and costs from Harvest, with burn rate projections and early overrun warnings.
